concept.title: Subscription Plan Pricing for Items
concept.abstract: System Admins can link multiple subscription plans with different prices to a single subscription item.

conbody.p: Prior to linking additional subscription plans to the same subscription item, System Admins must create a custom price rule for each plan.
On the Subscription Item record, navigate to the Subscription Plans related list and click Manage Subscription Plans.
Best practices recommend setting the item's default subscription plan to the plan with the highest price.
For Community Portal users, the price of the default subscription plan is displayed in the Store and on its related Item Detail page.
